Special Powers

May 29, 2021
wolfnet2000
anyone else find it odd that the regular Minotaurs have animal keyword while Ferdinand here doesn't?
May 8, 2021
Thunderwebs
Another figure that will need an errata along with Zeus. Ferdinand's point cost on the card is 30 (which feels about right) but on the card it's 50.
May 4, 2021
Organous
I really hope this is what Support becomes later. WK has said they don't know what to do with it. I always felt the roll to determine if you [b]could[/b] do it was unnecessary, especially when a lot of dedicated healer pieces get a low-value Defend to ensure it. This is a pretty good example of what a dedicated healer could be. He defends himself better than most, with Toughness and some value of Super Senses, but he still really needs protection to work. I used to have colossal Dormammu carry around Mystical Elf as a healing battery. I see myself doing the same here with Mojo or Onslaught. Side note, am I the only one who thinks this design is actually supposed to be Bova, caretaker of Scarlet Witch / Quicksilver?
April 3, 2021
Dortmuner
I get disappointment from a comic accurate standpoint, and I'd love to see an over the top combat dial for him (especially with that towering sculpt!), or even a switch dial where you could choose support or combat, but for 30 points you're healing a main attacker 1-3 clicks two out of every three turns. That's excellent. Forces your opponent to deal with him. Toughness gives him a chance to not be one shotted and end dial BCF with 10 attack and 50/50 chance of succeeding on SS isn't horrible. I think he'll be useful.
April 3, 2021
jra_fritid
I have to agree with a very disappointed Scott Porter at his WW80 unboxing Day 3. He was quite right about that Ferdinand. Given he is a monster her should have more clix. Also with his role and power in the WW comics. Compared to those captains like Steve Trevor with 8 or 5 clix for 60 or 40 points. And Trevor has 10 and even 11 attack while Ferdinand has only 10 and 9. Sure he has that defend but his dail is only 4 clix as the regular Minotaur. He is only 30 points and like the captains he could have been designed with a dual dial with 6 or just 5 clix for 50 or 40 points. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tHFB45IzwhM[/url]
